solution_line_template: He traveled {additional_miles} more than {base_miles} miles, or {base_miles}+{additional_miles}=<<{base_miles}+{additional_miles}={total_miles}>>{total_miles} miles.

He encountered {less_stop_signs} less than {base_stop_signs} stop signs, or {base_stop_signs}-{less_stop_signs}=<<{base_stop_signs}-{less_stop_signs}={total_stop_signs}>>{total_stop_signs} stop signs.
Thus, during his trip across town, Rudolph encountered {total_stop_signs}/{total_miles}=<<{total_stop_signs}/{total_miles}={stop_signs_per_mile}>>{stop_signs_per_mile} stop signs per mile.
